column5: Has anyone out there been to either Rainbow Point Lodge or to Chimo Outfitters Keeper Lake. Keeper also has a cabin from Nestor Falls Outpost Camps.I am wondering how the fishing was.Thanks,

Yes we have been to rainbow point lodge, we have a group going again next june also. I have been there 5 times so far and have no complaints about anything. Bob and Gail help out and put you on the fish and they also have a store there if you need something or run out. If you would like more info on where to go there or anything else fell free to e-mail me at [email protected]. Hope I can help with your questions.
